titles.title: When the enemy comes in like a flood upon you

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the enemy comes in like a flood upon you
The Spirit of the Lord shall raise a standard against him,
He shall flee (X2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lift up your banners your redemmer comes to Zion
Lift up your hearts and praise His name
Lift up your banners your redemmer comes to Zion
and the enemy shall flee, flee away.
